directions: Mash avocado, mayonnaise, sour cream, garlic powder, lemon juice, and honey together in a bowl until smooth and creamy; season with salt and pepper. Fold chicken, onion, and celery into avocado mixture until coated.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon honey, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Honey Avocado Chicken Salad
